summary: In 1943, the crew of a B-17 based in UK prepares for its 25th and last bombing mission over Germany before returning home to the USA.
cast: Matthew Modine|Eric Stoltz|Tate Donovan|D.B. Sweeney|Billy Zane|Sean Astin|Harry Connick Jr.|Reed Diamond|Courtney Gains|Neil Giuntoli|David Strathairn|John Lithgow|Jane Horrocks|Mac McDonald|Jodie Brooke Wilson|Keith Edwards|Steven Mackintosh|Greg Charles|Bradley Lavelle|Ben Browder|Mitch Webb|Paul Birchard|Bill Cullum|Eric Loren|Cathy Murphy|Morag Siller|Steve Elm|Jason Salkey|Martin McDougall|Greg Francis
title: Memphis Belle
